general.text: No magically modified products from this vendor!
My onions will make you cry! With delight!
Look at the size of those carrots!
Everything sold grown with local manure!
You've never had a kiss as sweet as my strawberry!
All my products have child-friendly shapes!
Great for juice, pie, or a snack!
All fruit grown with the secret knowledge of the elves!
Recover your stamina with Talagra's special recipe!
Specially brewed energy concoction for magic users!
